mapper.select:
SELECT count(DEBUG_TB.debug_seq) FROM DEBUG_TB INNER JOIN TEST_STATE_TB ON DEBUG_TB.TEST_STATE_SEQ = TEST_STATE_TB.TEST_STATE_SEQ INNER JOIN TEST_TB ON TEST_STATE_TB.TEST_SEQ = TEST_TB.TEST_SEQ INNER JOIN TEST_ITEM_TB ON TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ = TEST_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ AND TEST_ITEM_TB.STATE != 'D' INNER JOIN JOB_TB ON JOB_TB.QUO_YM = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_YM AND JOB_TB.QUO_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_SEQ LEFT JOIN DEBUG_STATE_TB ON DEBUG_STATE_TB.DEBUG_STATE_SEQ = ( SELECT DEBUG_STATE_SEQ FROM DEBUG_STATE_TB sub WHERE sub.DEBUG_SEQ = DEBUG_TB.DEBUG_SEQ order by DEBUG_STATE_SEQ desc limit 1 ) WHERE 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(DEBUG_TB.INS_DT, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(DEBUG_TB.UDT_DT, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
and DEBUG_STATE_TB.STATE_CODE = #{item.searchWord}
and DEBUG_TB.STATE_CODE = #{item.searchWord}
and CONCAT ( FN_GET_SEQSTRING ('SB', JOB_TB.sbk_ym, 'G', JOB_TB.sbk_seq), '-', TEST_TB.TEST_TYPE_CODE, LPAD (TEST_TB.TEST_NO, 4, 0) ) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL (TEST_ITEM_TB.product, JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and TEST_ITEM_TB.model like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')

from DEBUG_STATE_TB
inner join MEMBER_TB ins on DEBUG_STATE_TB.INS_MEM_ID = ins.id
